name: KOI
description: KOI was developed by decentralized builders, trusters, and founders within the Sui network and was distributed as an airdrop to reward the Sui community, with the goal of bringing prosperity and luck to all users. As a tribute to the original supporters who stood by Sui from the start, KOI is launched fairly, with no pre-allocations for the team or investors. KOI is a dedicated token created for all Sui lovers! Our goal is to share a sense of uniqueness, fun, and to represent the spirit of vitality and renewal. KOI embodies the vision of â€œA Fearless Fish Stirring Up Waves of Wealth in the Sui Ocean." Centered around the SUI community and driven by our holders, KOI strives to become the leading memecoin on Sui network.
